Member Enumeration Documentation

enum osgText::String::Encoding

Types of string encodings supported.

Enumerator:
ENCODING_UNDEFINED 
ENCODING_ASCII 

not using Unicode

ENCODING_UTF8 

unsigned char ASCII

ENCODING_UTF16 

8-bit unicode transformation format

ENCODING_UTF16_BE 

16-bit signature

ENCODING_UTF16_LE 

16-bit big-endian

ENCODING_UTF32 

16-bit little-endian

ENCODING_UTF32_BE 

32-bit signature

ENCODING_UTF32_LE 

32-bit big-endian

ENCODING_SIGNATURE 

32-bit little-endian

detect encoding from signature

void osgText::String::set ( const std::string &  text,
Encoding  encoding 
)

Set the text using a Unicode encoded std::string, which is converted to an internal TextString.

The encoding parameter specifies which Unicode encoding is used in the std::string.
